A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Best fight scene in Star Wars history... Rey\, Kylo vs the guards.... however...humor seemed straight out of a Harry Potter movie. The list goes on and on about poor execution due to the directing. I though the actors did well... but how the story was written and shot just didn't settle. I did enjoy many scene from this movie and that's why I'm giving it 2.5 stars. I am a die hard fan since a young boy. The whole time I was wishing JJ Abrams had directed this one...
